params.sqlcmd: "select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" as \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" as \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NAME\\" as \\"PROC_NAME\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\") as \\"PROC_NO\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE_BY_PROC\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE_BY_ITEM\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE_BY_ITEM\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE_BY_PROC\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\") as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WS_CD\\" as \\"WS_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"VEND_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" as \\"OPR_INST_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DRAW_CD\\" as \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" as \\"SPEC\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_STS_TYP\\" as \\"WORK_STS_TYP\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"PROC_EXPLOSION_FLG\\" as \\"PROC_EXPLOSION_FLG\\", " +" T_OD.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"UNIT_COST_TYP\\" as \\"UNIT_COST_TYP\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"UNIT_COST\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0099') as \\"UNIT_COST\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROCESSING_COST\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0099') as \\"PROCESSING_COST\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"MATERIAL_COST\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0099') as \\"MATERIAL_COST\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OTHER_OVERHEADS\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0099') as \\"OTHER_OVERHEADS\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PUCH_ODR_AMOUNT\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0099') as \\"PUCH_ODR_AMOUNT\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"DISC_AMOUNT\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0099') as \\"DISC_AMOUNT\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"ACPT_INSPC_TYP\\" as \\"ACPT_INSPC_TYP\\", " +" M_WS.\\"WS_NAME\\" as \\"WS_NAME\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_ANAME\\" as \\"VEND_ANAME\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"ROUND_TYP\\" as \\"ROUND_TYP\\", " +" M_CUR.\\"CUR_CD\\" as \\"CUR_CD\\", " +" M_CUR.\\"CUR_NAME\\" as \\"CUR_NAME\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\" as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" T_OD.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" as \\"PARENT_OD_NO\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" as \\"COMPANY_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"ODR_START_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"ODR_START_DATE\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\", " +" T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO\\", " +" T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"DUE_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"DUE_DATE\\", " +" T_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP_DN\\", " +" T_OD.MRP_ODR_TYP as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP_DN\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.EXCH_TYP as EXCH_TYP, " +" M_CUR.CUR_UNIT as VEND_CUR_UNIT, " +" M_CUR.DECIMAL_FIG as VEND_DECIMAL_FIG " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC, " +" T_OPR_INST_SLIP, " +" M_ITEM, " +" T_OD, " +" M_WS, " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" M_CUR, " +" SYS_HOME_CUR " +"where " +" T_OD.OD_NO = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OD_NO " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_ODR_CD = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_CD " +" and T_OPR_INST_SLIP.OPR_INST_CD(+) = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.OPR_INST_CD " +" and M_ITEM.ITEM_CD = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" and M_VEND_CTRL.COMPANY_CD(+) = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.COMPANY_CD " +" and M_VEND_CTRL.VEND_CD(+) = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.VEND_CD " +" and M_WS.WS_CD(+) = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WS_CD " +" and M_CUR.CUR_CD = nvl(M_VEND_CTRL.CUR_CD, SYS_HOME_CUR.HOME_CUR_CD) " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_STS_TYP = '1' " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and SYS_HOME_CUR.CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM' " +"order by " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\""
"insert into " +" T_OPR_INST_SLIP(\\"OPR_INST_CD\\", \\"OPR_INST_CD_GNR_TYP\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\") " +"values " +" (?, ?, ?)"

"insert into " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC(\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", \\"OD_NO\\", \\"PROC_NAME\\", \\"PROC_NO\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", \\"WS_CD\\", \\"COMPANY_CD\\", \\"VEND_CD\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", \\"UNIT_COST_TYP\\", \\"UNIT_COST\\", \\"PROCESSING_COST\\", \\"MATERIAL_COST\\", \\"OTHER_OVERHEADS\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_AMOUNT\\", \\"DISC_AMOUNT\\", \\"ACPT_INSPC_TYP\\", \\"WORK_STS_TYP\\", \\"FINAL_PROC_FLG\\", \\"OPR_INST_CD\\", \\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\") " +"values " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, to_date(?,'yyyy/mm/ddHH24MI'), to_date(?,'yyyy/mm/ddHH24MI'), to_number(?), ?, to_number(?), to_number(?), to_number(?), to_number(?), to_number(?), to_number(?), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) " +""

"update " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +"set " +" \\"PROC_NAME\\" = ?, " +" \\"PROC_NO\\" = ?, " +" \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\" = to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/ddHH24MI'), " +" \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\" = to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/ddHH24MI'), " +" \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"WS_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"VEND_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"ACPT_INSPC_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"UNIT_COST_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"UNIT_COST\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"PROCESSING_COST\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"MATERIAL_COST\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"OTHER_OVERHEADS\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"PUCH_ODR_AMOUNT\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"DISC_AMOUNT\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"OPR_INST_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\" = ?, " +" \\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"FINAL_PROC_FLG\\" = ? " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" = ?"
"delete from " +" T_OPR_INST_SLIP " +"where " +" T_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" = ?"
"delete from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" = ? " +"for update nowait"
"select " +" to_char(SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\" " +"from " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL " +"where " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" as \\"COMPANY_CD\\" " +"from " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM'"

"select " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"ROUND_TYP\\" as \\"ROUND_TYP\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_ANAME\\" as \\"VEND_ANAME\\", " +" M_CUR.\\"DECIMAL_FIG\\" as \\"DECIMAL_FIG\\" " +"from " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" M_CUR, " +" SYS_HOME_CUR " +"where " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CUR.CUR_CD = nvl(M_VEND_CTRL.CUR_CD, SYS_HOME_CUR.HOME_CUR_CD) " +" and SYS_HOME_CUR.CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM'"
"select " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\" as \\"CAL_DATE\\" " +"from " +" M_CAL " +"where " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_NO\\" = ? " +" and M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\" = ? " +" and M_CAL.\\"HOLIDAY_FLG\\" = 0"
"select " +" M_PLANT.\\"CAL_NO\\" as \\"CAL_NO\\" " +"from " +" M_PLANT " +"where " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_WS.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_WS " +"where " +" M_WS.\\"WS_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" T_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_OPR_INST_SLIP " +"where " +" T_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\" as \\"PROC_NO\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'HH24MI') as \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE_TIME\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\" = ( " +" select " +" min(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\") " +" from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +" where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" )"

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\" as \\"PROC_NO\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'HH24MI') as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE_TIME\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\" as \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\" = ( " +" select " +" max(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\") " +" from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +" where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" )"
"update " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"set " +" \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\" = to_date(?,'yyyy/mm/ddHH24MI') " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ?"

"update " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"set " +" \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\" = to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/ddHH24MI'), " +" \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\" = to_number(?) " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ?"
"update " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +"set " +" \\"FINAL_PROC_FLG\\" = ? " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" = ?"
"update " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"set " +" \\"PROC_EXPLOSION_FLG\\" = ? " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\" " +"from " +" T_OD " +"where " +" T_OD.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\" as \\"PROC_NO\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'HH24MI') as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE_TIME\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'HH24MI') as \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE_TIME\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\" as \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\" = ( " +" select " +" max(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\") " +" from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +" where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\" < ? " +" )"

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\" as \\"PROC_NO\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'HH24MI') as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE_TIME\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'HH24MI') as \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE_TIME\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\" as \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\" = ( " +" select " +" min(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\") " +" from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +" where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\" > ? " +" )"

"select " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_TYP\\", " +" to_char(T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'HH24MI') as \\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE_TIME\\" " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO\\" = 0 " +" and to_char(T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\") = ?"

"select " +" to_char(min(c.\\"DUE_DATE\\"), 'yyyy/mm/ddHH24MI') as \\"DUE_DATE\\" " +"from " +" T_OD a ,T_JOB_ODR_ALC b,T_OD c " +"where " +" a.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +"and " +" a.\\"JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO\\" = 0 " +"and " +" a.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = b.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" " +"and " +" c.\\"OD_NO\\" = b.\\"OD_NO\\""
"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +"for update nowait"
"select " +" T_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_OPR_INST_SLIP " +"where " +" T_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" = ? " +"for update nowait"

"update " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"set " +" \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\" = to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/ddHH24MI'), " +" \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\" = to_number(?) " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\" = ?"

"select " +" SYS_TAX_NAME.\\"TAX_NAME_1\\" as \\"TAX_NAME_1\\", " +" SYS_TAX_NAME.\\"TAX_NAME_2\\" as \\"TAX_NAME_2\\", " +" SYS_TAX_NAME.\\"TAX_NAME_3\\" as \\"TAX_NAME_3\\" " +"from " +" SYS_TAX_NAME " +"where " +" SYS_TAX_NAME.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM'"
"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" AS \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"PLANT_CD\\" AS \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_STS_TYP\\") AS \\"WORK_STS_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"PROC_EXPLOSION_FLG\\") AS \\"PROC_EXPLOSION_FLG\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") AS \\"h_MODIFY_COUNT_BY_ITEM\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" AS \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DRAW_CD\\" AS \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" AS \\"SPEC\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_OD.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\") AS \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" AS \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_OD.MRP_ODR_TYP AS \\"MRP_ODR_TYP_DN\\", " +" M_ITEM.MANHOUR_TYP AS \\"MANHOUR_TYP\\" " +"FROM " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM, " +" M_ITEM, " +" T_OD " +"WHERE " +" T_OD.OD_NO = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OD_NO " +" AND M_ITEM.ITEM_CD = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" AS \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NAME\\" AS \\"PROC_NAME\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\") AS \\"PROC_NO\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\") AS \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\") AS \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0099') AS \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\") AS \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WS_CD\\" AS \\"WS_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"VEND_CD\\" AS \\"VEND_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" AS \\"OPR_INST_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") AS \\"h_MODIFY_COUNT_BY_ITEM\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") AS \\"h_MODIFY_COUNT_BY_PROC\\", " +" to_char(NVL(T_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", 0)) AS \\"h_MODIFY_COUNT_OPR_INST\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OD_NO\\" AS \\"h_OD_NO\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_STS_TYP\\") AS \\"WORK_STS_TYP\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\"AS \\"OUTSIDE_TYP_DN\\" " +"FROM " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC, " +" T_OPR_INST_SLIP " +"WHERE " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_ODR_CD = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_CD " +" AND T_OPR_INST_SLIP.OPR_INST_CD(+) = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.OPR_INST_CD " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_STS_TYP = '1' " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +"ORDER BY " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\""

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" as \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" to_char(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\") as \\"h_UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"ODR_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as \\"h_ODR_START_DATE\\", " +" T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"h_OD_NO\\", " +" T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" as \\"h_JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\") as \\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\", " +" T_OD.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" as \\"h_PARENT_OD_NO\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM, " +" M_ITEM, " +" T_OD " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" " +" and T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\" " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" AS \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" AS \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NAME\\" AS \\"PROC_NAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\") AS \\"PROC_NO\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') AS \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\") AS \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WS_CD\\" AS \\"WS_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" AS \\"OPR_INST_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"VEND_CD\\" AS \\"VEND_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"ACPT_INSPC_TYP\\") AS \\"ACPT_INSPC_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"UNIT_COST_TYP\\") AS \\"UNIT_COST_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"UNIT_COST\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0099') AS \\"UNIT_COST\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROCESSING_COST\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0099') AS \\"PROCESSING_COST\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"MATERIAL_COST\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0099') AS \\"MATERIAL_COST\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OTHER_OVERHEADS\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0099') AS \\"OTHER_OVERHEADS\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PUCH_ODR_AMOUNT\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0099') AS \\"PUCH_ODR_AMOUNT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"DISC_AMOUNT\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0099') AS \\"DISC_AMOUNT\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\" AS \\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") AS \\"h_MODIFY_COUNT_BY_ITEM\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") AS \\"h_MODIFY_COUNT_BY_PROC\\", " +" TO_CHAR(NVL(T_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", 0)) AS \\"h_MODIFY_COUNT_OPR_INST\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" AS \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" AS \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\") AS \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" M_WS.\\"WS_NAME\\" AS \\"WS_NAME\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_ANAME\\" AS \\"VEND_ANAME\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"CUR_CD\\" AS \\"CUR_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_VEND_CTRL.\\"ROUND_TYP\\") AS \\"ROUND_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_VEND_CTRL.\\"EXCH_TYP\\") AS \\"EXCH_TYP\\", " +" M_CUR.\\"CUR_UNIT\\" AS \\"CUR_UNIT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_OD.\\"ODR_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS \\"ODR_START_DATE\\", " +" T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" AS \\"OD_NO\\", " +" T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" AS \\"h_JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\") AS \\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\", " +" T_OD.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" AS \\"h_PARENT_OD_NO\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MANHOUR_TYP\\") AS \\"h_MANHOUR_TYP\\" " +"FROM " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC, " +" T_OPR_INST_SLIP, " +" M_ITEM, " +" T_OD, " +" M_WS, " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" M_CUR, " +" SYS_HOME_CUR " +"WHERE " +" T_OD.OD_NO = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OD_NO " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_ODR_CD = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_CD " +" AND T_OPR_INST_SLIP.OPR_INST_CD(+) = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.OPR_INST_CD " +" AND M_ITEM.ITEM_CD = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" AND M_VEND_CTRL.COMPANY_CD(+) = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.COMPANY_CD " +" AND M_VEND_CTRL.VEND_CD(+) = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.VEND_CD " +" AND M_WS.WS_CD(+) = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WS_CD " +" AND M_CUR.CUR_CD = nvl(M_VEND_CTRL.CUR_CD, SYS_HOME_CUR.HOME_CUR_CD) " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_STS_TYP = '1' " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_IN_PROC_CD = ? " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" AND SYS_HOME_CUR.CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM'"

"select " +" T_OD.JOB_ODR_CD, " +" T_OD.PARENT_OD_NO " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC, " +" T_OD " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.OD_NO = T_OD.OD_NO " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_IN_PROC_CD = ?"

"select " +" to_char(count(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\")) as \\"countWORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_ODR_CD = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_CD " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_STS_TYP = '1' " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_CD = ?"

"select " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"DUE_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"DUE_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"DUE_DATE\\", 'HH24MI') as \\"DUE_DATE_TIME\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC, " +" T_OD " +"where " +" T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OD_NO\\" " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ?"
"SELECT " +" M_ITEM.\\"CAL_NO\\" AS \\"CAL_NO\\" " +"FROM " +" M_ITEM " +"WHERE " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_ITEM.\\"CAL_NO\\" is not null"
"SELECT " +" SYS_PARAMETER.\\"VALUE\\" AS \\"VALUE\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_PARAMETER " +"WHERE " +" SYS_PARAMETER.\\"NAME\\" = 'TIME_CTRL'"

"SELECT " +" count(1) " +"FROM " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC, " +" T_OPR_INST_SLIP " +"WHERE " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_ODR_CD = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_CD " +" AND T_OPR_INST_SLIP.OPR_INST_CD(+) = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.OPR_INST_CD " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_STS_TYP = '1' " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND ROWNUM <= NVL(TO_NUMBER(?), ROWNUM) + 1"
